channel.title: Muhamad Ali Ridho - Tech Blog
channel.description: Latest tech insights, tutorials, and thoughts from Muhamad Ali Ridho, a tech enthusiast exploring AI, IoT, and web development.

item.title: How to Create a Free Business Email with Your Own Domain & Cloudflare (Without Hosting)
item.description: Want to have a professional email address like admin@yourbusiness.com with no monthly fees? Follow this complete guide to set up a free business email using Cloudflare Email Routing and Gmail. Simple and cost‑effective!
item.content:encoded: Want to have a professional email address like admin@yourbusiness.com with no monthly fees? Follow this complete guide to set up a free business email using Cloudflare Email Routing and Gmail. Simple and cost‑effective!
item.author: aldhoproject@gmail.com (Muhamad Ali Ridho)

item.title: Deploy Telegram Bot Gratis dengan Cloudflare Workers
item.description: Bikin bot Telegram serverless dengan JavaScript yang bisa handle jutaan request tanpa biaya server.
item.content:encoded: Lupakan Heroku atau VPS mahal. Cloudflare Workers adalah cara termudah dan termurah untuk hosting bot Telegram...
item.author: aldhoproject@gmail.com (Muhamad Ali Ridho)
